name: InfectiousReaction
description:
LuxJam Entry - does not include Playfab.

Update 2:   Added way to climb out of the pit.

Update :  Fixed the UI , made color changes more notable  and  rebaked Navmesh to exclude the bridge area.      

Kept original slightly broken build as a second zip to DL.

You play as a survivor with Paranormal ability to see when people are infected with the DMB  airborne virus. 
Holed up together with others in an industrial facility, as people around you start to get infected you must try to escape while avoiding getting infected.

Controls :  WASD to move , mouse to look around.

Disclaimer(updated) : At present the game-play is unpolished , and  not  that fun or interesting,  sorry about that .    Hope you would at least find the concept interesting.

I'm new to Unity and learned a lot during the making of this   3 days  project and took some time after to learn even more and fix it.

 All 3d assets made by myself using : Blender  and Zbrush
  Additionally software : VScode and Unity.
Unity assets: FPScontroller by Unity.
